pages.markdown:
# About Us

At The CKB  Firm, we have created an atmosphere of excellence. As our harshest critics, we constantly strive to improve our firm and provide exceptional legal collection services on a consistent basis.

The cornerstone of our success is the quality relationships which we maintain with our clients. We pride ourselves on the ability to tailor our legal representation to meet the diverse needs of our clients. CKB clients are timely updated regarding the status of their cases and given intelligent legal recommendations.

The CKB Firm is at the forefront in law office automation. With an eye towards the future, we invest in the latest technology for the benefit of our clients. Through technology we aim to provide value-added legal collection services to the business community.

Our client base includes large and medium size publicly traded and privately held business, including, banks, financial institutions, manufacturers, and distributors.

The CKB Firm, through its network of attorneys, is capable of handling creditor claims throughout the United States.

The CKB Firm is a member in the Commercial Law League of America (CLLA), The National Creditors Bar Association (NARCA), The Forwarder’s List, The American Lawyers Quarterly (ALQ) The Illinois Creditors Bar (ILCBA), and The General Bar.

# Patricia Lepak

## **Patricia Lepak**

Ms. Lepak is a graduate of DePaul University in Chicago, Illinois and completed her undergraduate studies in English at University of Illinois in Champaign, Illinois.  Her practice area is limited to commercial litigation, creditor/debtor actions and collections.

Current Employment Position:Chief Compliance Officer

Areas Of Practice:Commercial LitigationCreditor/Debtor ActionsCollections

Bar Admissions:Illinois, 1995
